Package eventorganizer

Class EventOrganizer

java.lang.Object
eventorganizer.EventOrganizer
public class EventOrganizer extends Object
This class represents a user interface to process user input from command lines. This program allows a user to add, cancel and remove, and sort and display events in an event calendar by various criteria such as by event date, campus, and department.
Author:
Jerlin Yuen, Jason Lei

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Prints running/terminated statements Creates new eventCalendar object and calls scan function

    • scan

      public void scan(EventCalendar eventCalendar)
      Creates new scanner object and cycles through each command line argument. Tokenizes the first command and calls a different function based on each command
      Parameters:
      eventCalendar - calendar of events

    • addEvent

      public static void addEvent(String line, EventCalendar eventCalendar)
      Adds an event to eventCalendar based on commandline input. Cycles through each token and calls other functions to handle each string token before adding to eventCalendar
      Parameters:
      line - - event to be inputted into eventCalendar
      eventCalendar - - calendar of events

    • cancelEvent

      public static void cancelEvent(String line, EventCalendar eventCalendar)
      Removes an event from eventCalendar based on commandline input. Cycles through each token and calls other functions to handle each string token before adding to eventCalendar
      Parameters:
      line - - event to be removed from eventCalendar
      eventCalendar - - calendar of events

    • extractContact

      public static Contact extractContact(String departmentCode, String emailCode)
      Returns Contact object and checks for invalid inputs
      Parameters:
      departmentCode - - string of department acronym to be verified
      emailCode - - email to be verified
      Returns:
      returns a contact object if departmentCode/emailCode is valid or else returns null

    • extractLocation

      public static Location extractLocation(String locationCode)
      Returns Location object and checks for invalid input
      Parameters:
      locationCode - - a string of possible event locations
      Returns:
      returns a Location object if locationCode is valid or else returns null

    • extractTimeslot

      public static Timeslot extractTimeslot(String timeslot)
      Returns a Timeslot object and checks for invalid input
      Parameters:
      timeslot - - a string of possible event timeslots
      Returns:
      returns a Timeslot object if timeslot is valid or else returns null

    • extractDate

      public static Date extractDate(String stringDate)
      Returns a date object and checks for invalid input
      Parameters:
      stringDate - - a string of possible event dates
      Returns:
      returns a Date object if date is valid or else returns null
